description: Mobile bbq Serving mesquite smoked meats The Real Deal!!!Morton's Barbecue mobile bbq truck is operated by Rashad Morton, a San Antonio native. After returning to Texas in the spring of 2010,  I decided to pursue my dream and start my own business, now known as Morton's Barbecue. I have  been cooking since I was kid and it  is my passion. I just like to see people enjoy good , slow-smoked barbecue without spending a lot of money. Currently operating as a mobile barbecue service in Northeast San Antonio. Morton's plan is to establish a permanent site located on the Northside. I am now open 6 days a week.  So if you enjoy good barbecue, then you will love Morton's Barbecue !  The Real Deal!!
name: Morton's Barbecue
